# Problem Statement

In this notebook we will explore how to do Automatic Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) on the Tabular Playground Series January 2022 dataset using [sweetviz](https://pypi.org/project/sweetviz/).

We are going to cover the following steps:
1. Install sweetviz
2. Import Libaries
3. Load Dataset
4. Print Report
5. References

Let's get started.

# Install sweetviz
